name: My Status Window Went on Strike
author: SON &#40쏜&#41
content: Monsters pour out of gates, wreaking havoc on the world, but Taejun couldn’t care less. After seven years of failure and bullying in his hunter’s guild, he’s fired—until his dormant S-Tier power suddenly activates. Now, with newfound strength, Taejun hunts monsters, exacts brutal revenge, and rises to fame. But as his power grows, so does the danger, and shadowy forces begin targeting him. Can Taejun stay one step ahead and crush those who want him dead?
